description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing, Keqing is an Electro sword user who excels at fast attacks and high single-target damage.
info: Keqing is a fast Electro DPS who excels at single-target damage and quick Electro application. Build her for CRIT, Electro DMG, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Yunlai Swordsmanship
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Stellar Restoration
skills.desc: Keqing hurls a Lightning Stiletto, dealing Electro DMG and allowing her to teleport to its location for a follow-up slash.
skills.details_html:
Stellar Restoration
Hurls a Lightning Stiletto, dealing Electro DMG and allowing Keqing to teleport to its location for a follow-up slash. Hold to adjust the direction of the Stiletto.

skills.name: Starward Sword
skills.desc: Keqing unleashes a series of swift slashes, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Starward Sword
Unleashes a series of swift slashes, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG. Lasts for 2s.

passive_talents.name: Thundering Penance
passive_talents.desc: After recasting Stellar Restoration, Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks deal 50% increased Electro DMG for 5s.

passive_talents.name: Aristocratic Dignity
passive_talents.desc: Using Starward Sword increases Keqing's CRIT Rate by 15% and Energy Recharge by 15% for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Land's Overseer
passive_talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.desc: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start and end of her teleport.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.desc: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance to produce an Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Foreseen Reformation
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.desc: For 10s after triggering an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, Keqing's ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.desc: Keqing's CRIT DMG is increased by 30% and her Normal and Charged Attacks unleash a Lightning Stiletto on hit.
